remarks: Scalar multiplication for the final constructed Hilbert space. (Contributed by NM, 22-Jun-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hlhilslem.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hlhilslem.e $e |- E = ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) $.
hlhilslem.u $e |- U = ( ( HLHil ` K ) ` W ) $.
hlhilslem.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
hlhilslem.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hlhilsmul.m $e |- .x. = ( .r ` E ) $.
hlhilsmul $p |- ( ph -> .x. = ( .r ` R ) ) $.
